document_data.caption: Orcus gives "life" to Cyrog once more.
document_data.name: Cyrog
document_data.mainbody: '''Cyrog''' was an [[elder brain]] of the [[Underdark]] settlement also known as [[Cyrog]].
document_data.Description: Cyrog was described to be enormous, and was situated within a large pool.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Cyrog was dying. The [[mind flayer]], [[Xetzirbor]], left Cyrog to find a cure for the dying elder brain and travelled to [[Gravenhollow]]. However, after Xetzirbor had left, a burst of [[faerzress]] occurred in the chamber, and [[Orcus]] appeared. Orcus pointed his [[Wand of Orcus|wand]] at the dying elder brain. Cyrog then communicated with the illithids under his control, telling them that Orcus had saved it, and that they should follow it into [[undeath]].
